structure.unit: ARTICLE XVII. BRANCH OFFICES OF COUNTY AUTO TAG AGENCY

text.section:
Sec. 2-120.3. Business hours.
Each branch office shall be open to the public from 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. on all days when County government offices are normally open unless otherwise required or authorized by the Tax Collector. Branch offices have the option to open their offices on other days and to maintain longer office hours. Operating hours must be prominently displayed at each public entrance to the branch office.
